contents:
哪怕是醫療先進國家遇上這病毒都得醫療體系崩潰....可以預見的要是世界各國都出現這種情況，那中共就死...

你說的是這個？
https://nypost.com/2020/03/08/asian-man-stabbed-in-suspected-coronavirus-related-hate-crime/
Police sources initially said the attack was investigated as a possible coronavirus-related hate crime because both men were wearing surgical masks, but officials later said there was “absolutely no nexus between the attack and the coronavirus.”

這裡也有報道，指兩人都是華人：
https://www.worldjournal.com/6828344/article-賣口罩生隙？仇殺？-布碌崙8大道華男被刺13刀/
